unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about the best time to travel from Delhi to Agra by train. Honestly, it depends on what you're looking for! The Taj Mahal is open pretty much year-round, but weather-wise, Oct to March is usually best. Think pleasant days, not too hot or cold. So if you're planning a trip around then, you've got tons of train options.
normalised: Okay, so someone asked about the best time to travel from Delhi to Agra by train. Honestly, it depends on what you're looking for! The Taj Mahal is open pretty much year-round, but weather-wise, October to March is usually best. Think pleasant days, not too hot or cold. So if you're planning a trip around then, you've got tons of train options.

unnormalised: For example, the Taj Express (12279) leaves Delhi around 13:15 hrs and gets to Agra by 16:00 hrs. Super convenient for a day trip! Or, there's the Gatimaan Express (12050) - it's faster, leaving around 08:10 AM and reaching Agra in about 1 hr 40 mins. Downside? It's usually pricier. Check IRCTC for the latest timings and fares, as they can change slightly. Just remember peak season (like Diwali time) means booked-out trains and higher prices, so book in advance!
normalised: For example, the Taj Express (one two two seven nine) leaves Delhi around one three fifteen hours and gets to Agra by sixteen zero zero hours. Super convenient for a day trip! Or, there's the Gatimaan Express (one two zero five zero) - it's faster, leaving around zero eight ten A-M and reaching Agra in about one hour forty minutes. Downside? It's usually pricier. Check I-R-C-T-C for the latest timings and fares, as they can change slightly. Just remember peak season (like Diwali time) means booked-out trains and higher prices, so book in advance!

unnormalised: Also, remember to factor in traffic to and from the railway station, esp if you're travelling during peak hours. Places like New Delhi Railway Station (NDLS) can be super crowded. And yeah, prepone or postpone your trip according to your convenience and availability! Enjoy your trip to Agra!
normalised: Also, remember to factor in traffic to and from the railway station, especially if you're travelling during peak hours. Places like New Delhi Railway Station (N-D-L-S) can be super crowded. And yeah, prepone or postpone your trip according to your convenience and availability! Enjoy your trip to Agra!
